name: “一炮走红”
One-hit Wonder
description: 满血状态下受到一次伤害大于3000的攻击并直接死亡
Defeated instantly at full HP by a single attack dealing over 3000 damage.
description3

name: 火力全开
Some Like It Hot
description: 在“席菈的试炼 绝级”中，累计身处“劫火”或“烧伤”状态180秒并通关。
Clear 'Sheila’s Trial: Legend' while being inflicted by “Scorchrend” or “Burn” for 180 seconds in total.
description3

name: 皓月之下
Under the Bright Moon
description: 在“泽娜的试炼 绝级”中，在没有“铁壁”状态的情况下承受泽娜的“创世圣冠”攻击5次，并不使用任何复活通关。
Clear 'Zena’s Trial: Legend' without using any revive, and take Zena’s Genesis Moonbeam 5 times without the “Invincible” status in the quest.
description3

name: 直奔主题
Cut to the Chase
description: 不击败塞西娅的情况下，通关“伊莉雅的试炼 超级”。
Clear 'Ilia’s Trial: Master' without defeating Zethia.
